alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 5:24PM CDT until April 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR YAZOO COUNTY... At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Yazoo City to 7 miles southeast of Holly Bluff, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Benton around 535 PM CDT. Little Yazoo around 545 PM CDT. Vaughan and Myrleville around 550 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eden, Satartia and Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
